HomePage.title: ELITE DIGITAL AGENCY
HomePage.description: We don't just create websites. We build digital ecosystems that transform your vision into market domination.
HomePage.impact_desc: Technology is just a tool. Our real business is generating growth for your company.
HomePage.imp_1_desc: Amazon proved that 100ms latency costs 1% in sales. We optimize every millisecond.
HomePage.imp_2_desc: No critical bugs. We deliver tested, secure systems ready to scale.
HomePage.imp_3_desc: We deploy your MVPs twice as fast as a classic agency.
HomePage.art_1_desc: Speed is a law. We develop Next.js sites optimized for Core Web Vitals.
HomePage.art_2_desc: Native React Native apps offering a fluid 60 FPS experience.
HomePage.art_3_desc: By integrating Three.js and WebGL, we transform your site into a memorable experience.
HomePage.method_desc: No room for chance. We apply a rigorous engineering process.
HomePage.nexus_desc: The ultimate fitness app. Merging Bio-Tracking, AI, and Design System.
HomePage.contact_desc: Let's discuss your project and create something exceptional.

Footer.description: Elite digital agency. We forge digital realities for visionaries who refuse the status quo.
Footer.address_1: C/O MOROCCAN AGENCY FOR ECONOMIC INTELLIGENCE

AgencePage.subtitle: IDENTITY & ORIGIN
AgencePage.vision_text: MazouzWS was born from a realization: big agencies are slow and impersonal. I offer an alternative: high-flying technical expertise, directly accessible. No opaque outsourcing, I am your sole pilot.
AgencePage.engagement_text: I only take on a limited number of projects per year to guarantee total attention. When you work with me, you hire my brain, my hands, and my obsession for detail.
AgencePage.history_2023_desc: Launch of operations. A conviction: the future belongs to versatile experts capable of merging design and engineering.
AgencePage.history_2024_desc: Voluntary pause of commercial operations. A year dedicated to internal R&D, re-engineering the technical architecture, and mastering breakthrough technologies (Next.js 15, AI).
AgencePage.history_2025_desc: Official agency reactivation. MazouzWS returns with an elite tech stack and a sharpened vision: delivering excellence without compromise.
AgencePage.val_1_desc: No more broken telephone. You speak directly to the builder. Zero information loss, maximum reactivity.
AgencePage.val_2_desc: By mastering 100% of the chain, I guarantee total consistency. Design serves code, code serves performance.
AgencePage.val_3_desc: A light structure means fast decisions. No endless meetings. We move forward through rapid iterations.
AgencePage.bio: The sole architect behind your projects. I am not just a developer, I am your strategic partner. From the first line of code to final deployment, I guarantee a unified vision and frictionless execution.
AgencePage.cta_desc: Do you have an ambitious project? I look for challenges, not just contracts. If you want to build something solid and lasting, let's talk.

ServicesPage.subtitle: OPERATIONAL CAPABILITIES
ServicesPage.serv_1_desc: Native React Native apps at 60FPS. Offline-first architecture.
ServicesPage.serv_2_desc: Injection of LLMs (GPT-4) and autonomous agents.
ServicesPage.serv_4_desc: Scalable backends to handle millions of requests.
ServicesPage.serv_5_desc: Fusion of code and metal. Drone piloting.
ServicesPage.serv_6_desc: Radical optimization. Aiming for 100/100 Lighthouse score.
ServicesPage.diag_title: YOUR INFRASTRUCTURE IS SLOWING YOU DOWN.
ServicesPage.diag_desc: Every second of load time costs you 7% in conversions.
ServicesPage.imp_1_desc: An immersive site holds attention 4x longer.
ServicesPage.imp_2_desc: Every 100ms gained in loading increases sales by 1%.
ServicesPage.imp_3_desc: Our AI solutions process your data 24/7.
ServicesPage.vis_title: YOU HAVE THE VISION. WE HAVE THE FIREPOWER.
ServicesPage.vis_desc: We are the elite extension of your team.
ServicesPage.vision_subtitle: We know you aren't looking for "code", you're looking for a solution.
ServicesPage.vision_text: We handle the technical complexity so you can focus on your business. We become your external CTO, ensuring your infrastructure is never a bottleneck to your growth.

MethodePage.subtitle: METHODOLOGY
MethodePage.intro: Chaos is the enemy. We apply scientific rigor to digital creation.
MethodePage.step_1_desc: We dissect your business model and technical constraints.
MethodePage.step_2_desc: Foundation design. High-fidelity mockups and data architecture.
MethodePage.step_3_desc: 2-week Sprints. You see the product evolve in real-time.
MethodePage.step_4_desc: Load tests, security audits. We hunt down every bug.
MethodePage.step_5_desc: Production deployment on Cloud Edge. Your project is alive.
MethodePage.standards_subtitle: We deliver resilient, secure, and documented code.
MethodePage.tools_desc: The best tools for total transparency.
MethodePage.transparency_desc: No more 'Black Box'. Access our dashboard.
